entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 01:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with freezing rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain at times heavy mixed with snow at times heavy before morning. Local snowfall amount 10 cm near Squamish. Wind light except north 50 km/h near Bowen Island. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:02 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain at times heavy or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times heavy mixed with snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy in the afternoon. Wind light except north 50 km/h near Bowen Island early in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:02 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
